body: Bruh you need to go and confess to your wife, that's not healthy your gonna be mentslly deranged is just a few years - you maoing yourself crazy and you want it too, it shows that you get horny by being a cuck and you know that you could all easily confirm this, a phone is enough leave phone while it's recording is on and then boom you have proof.

Nice twist at the end. Have to decide for yourself whether or not she was actually cheating or whether or not it was a delusion. I’d go with the fact that it was never a delusion but because he had already had them before he could differentiate between that & reality. I’m getting that from when she acknowledged his existence right outside the door & from the first delusions we never saw her inner thoughts, just something he assumed she’d say. Idk this shit was strange, but I liked it.

“This is why you talk shit like this with your partner” and “make sure to take care of her first lest she find someone to do it for you” are among the dumbest shit I've heard in the past week.

The moral of the story is that acting like a cuck make you into a cuck. It also helps to find an honest and/or loyal partner who will commit to the relationship and/or actually voice her opinions to you instead of jumping into someone else's pants. If you don't think you have that kind of relationship, you're just settling by staying in it (unless you were actually hoping for an NTR relationship.)
